ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games

9 using System;
10 using System.Collections.Generic;
11 using ColorShapeLinks.Common;
12 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
13 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session;
14 
15 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.Lib
16 {
20  public class SessionController :
21  IMatchDataProvider, ISessionSubject, ISessionDataProvider
22  {
23  // The session controlled by this controller (i.e., the model)
24  private Session session;
25 
26  // Match configuration
27  private IMatchConfig matchConfig;
28 
29  // Session configuration
30  private ISessionConfig sessionConfig;
31 
32  // List of thinker prototypes for thinkers participating in
33  // this session
34  private IEnumerable<IThinkerPrototype> thinkerPrototypes;
35 
36  // List of thinker listeners
37  private IEnumerable<IThinkerListener> thinkerListeners;
38 
39  // List of match listeners
40  private IEnumerable<IMatchListener> matchListeners;
41 
42  // List of thinkers in the current match
43  private IList<IThinker> currentThinkers;
44 
45  // Reference to the current match
46  private Match currentMatch;
47 
48  // Reference to the game board in the current match
49  private Board board;
50 
51  // Result of last match
52  private Winner lastMatchResult = Winner.None;
53 
66  public SessionController(
67  IMatchConfig matchConfig,
68  ISessionConfig sessionConfig,
69  IEnumerable<IThinkerPrototype> thinkerPrototypes,
70  IEnumerable<IThinkerListener> thinkerListeners,
71  IEnumerable<IMatchListener> matchListeners,
72  IEnumerable<ISessionListener> sessionListeners)
73  {
74  // Keep parameters
75  this.matchConfig = matchConfig;
76  this.sessionConfig = sessionConfig;
77  this.thinkerPrototypes = thinkerPrototypes;
78  this.thinkerListeners = thinkerListeners;
79  this.matchListeners = matchListeners;
80 
81  // Register session listeners
82  foreach (ISessionListener listener in sessionListeners)
83  listener.ListenTo(this);
84 
85  // Instantiate list of current thinkers
86  currentThinkers = new IThinker[2];
87  }
88 
100  public ExitStatus Run(bool complete)
101  {
102  // The exit status
103  ExitStatus exitStatus = default;
104 
105  // Create a new session (the model in MVC)
106  session = new Session(thinkerPrototypes, sessionConfig, complete);
107 
108  // Notify listeners that session is about to start
109  BeforeSession?.Invoke(this);
110 
111  // Play each match defined by the session
112  while (session.NextMatch(out currentMatch))
113  {
114  // Create a new board for the current match
115  board = new Board(matchConfig.Rows, matchConfig.Cols,
116  matchConfig.WinSequence, matchConfig.RoundPiecesPerPlayer,
117  matchConfig.SquarePiecesPerPlayer);
118 
119  // Instantiate thinkers for the current match
120  currentThinkers[(int)PColor.White] =
121  currentMatch.thinkerWhite.Create();
122  currentThinkers[(int)PColor.Red] =
123  currentMatch.thinkerRed.Create();
124 
125  // Add registered listeners to the thinker instances
126  foreach (IThinkerListener listener in thinkerListeners)
127  {
128  foreach (IThinker thinker in currentThinkers)
129  {
130  listener.ListenTo(thinker);
131  }
132  }
133 
134  // Create a match controller for the current match
135  MatchController mc = new MatchController(matchConfig, this);
136 
137  // Register match listeners with the match controller
138  foreach (IMatchListener listener in matchListeners)
139  {
140  listener.ListenTo(mc);
141  }
142 
143  // Notify listeners that a match is about to start
144  BeforeMatch?.Invoke(currentMatch);
145 
146  // Ask the controller to run the match and keep the result
147  lastMatchResult = mc.Run();
148 
149  // Update variables and properties related to the match result
150  exitStatus = lastMatchResult.ToExitStatus();
151 
152  // Update the winner string
153  if (lastMatchResult != Winner.Draw)
154  {
155  PColor winnerColor = lastMatchResult.ToPColor();
156  WinnerString = winnerColor.FormatName(
157  currentThinkers[(int)winnerColor].ToString());
158  }
159  else
160  {
161  WinnerString = lastMatchResult.ToString();
162  }
163 
164  // Notify result to session
165  session.SetResult(lastMatchResult);
166 
167  // Notify listeners that a match is over
168  AfterMatch?.Invoke(currentMatch, this);
169  }
170 
171  // Notify listeners that sessions is about to end
172  AfterSession?.Invoke(this);
173 
174  // The exit status will either be for a complete session of
175  // associated with the match result
176  return complete ? ExitStatus.Session : exitStatus;
177  }
178 
179  // //////////////////////////////////// //
180  // Implementation of IMatchDataProvider //
181  // //////////////////////////////////// //
182 
185  public Board Board => board;
186 
189  public IThinker CurrentThinker => currentThinkers[(int)board.Turn];
190 
193  public IThinker GetThinker(PColor thinkerColor) =>
194  currentThinkers[(int)thinkerColor];
195 
196  // ///////////////////////////////// //
197  // Implementation of ISessionSubject //
198  // ///////////////////////////////// //
199 
202  public event Action<ISessionDataProvider> BeforeSession;
203 
206  public event Action<ISessionDataProvider> AfterSession;
207 
210  public event Action<Match> BeforeMatch;
211 
214  public event Action<Match, ISessionDataProvider> AfterMatch;
215 
216  // ////////////////////////////////////// //
217  // Implementation of ISessionDataProvider //
218  // ////////////////////////////////////// //
219 
226  public SessionState State =>
227  throw new NotImplementedException("Session state not implemented");
228 
231  public ISessionConfig SessionConfig => sessionConfig;
232 
235  public IMatchConfig MatchConfig => matchConfig;
236 
239  public Match CurrentMatch => currentMatch;
240 
243  public IEnumerable<Match> Matches => session;
244 
247  public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<Match, Winner>> Results =>
248  session.GetResults();
249 
252  public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, int>> Standings =>
253  session.GetStandings();
254 
257  public Winner LastMatchResult => lastMatchResult;
258 
261  public string WinnerString { get; private set; }
262  }
263 }
